noticeHead: Leapfrog is currently seeking fresh graduates
noticeBody:
Leapfrog is currently seeking fresh graduates or early-career professionals for the following roles: - Associate Software Engineer (Web Development)
- Associate Machine Learning (ML) Engineer
- Associate Data Engineer

We kindly request your support in circulating the form below to recent graduates or any other potential candidates (below 8th sem) who may be a good fit.

By filling out the form, they'll be considered for current roles as well as future opportunities.
